resources.string:
This app is for you who might need to find gas stations (both natural gas and regular gas and diesel) in Sweden. 
You can download KML-files and install them for the app by clicking Download. Note that the KML-files must contain a Placemark-tag with name-tag and Point-tag. 
The best way to ensure valid KML-files is to use the site from Download. 
You can also get a navigation to the closest stations by either distance or traveling time.
Location service can\'t be connected to.
